title: Fortifier

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Build a fort at someone's house every night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Building takes 1 day.
-You may have as many forts as you would like.
-You will learn how many of each faction (Town and Neutral included) visit people with forts in them.
-If an evil faction or a NK visits a target with a fort, the fort Is destroyed at the end of the night.
